Name: Grand Hall2
Text: 4 doors lead away from the chamber, there is a old grandfather clock standing on the left. What do you do?

Name: Grand Hall3
Text: You return to the grand hall. What do you do?

Name: Grandfather clock
Text: The old wooden clock is covered with dust. Its mechanism seems to have gone silent many years ago.

Name: Clock hands moved
Text: As the mechanism clicks into place you hear a rubmbling of stone echoing from one of the rooms.
